name: Get the Key!!
description:
This is my Get the Key project.

Modifications:

1. Create a fully interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.

2. An extra level was added and tied together.

3. Some modifications to the out-of-game menu.

4.. Added new enemies with more powerful abilities.

5. Replace some of the sound effects in the game and update the game's sound design.

6. New background custom music in the game.

7. Added new obstacles and challenges, now the map is more complex.

Credit:

Created by Qihao Zhou
